JoinAScheduledMeeting.title: Step 1
JoinAScheduledMeeting.content1: Send a meeting invitation to attendees and the conference room email address (MTR account).
JoinAScheduledMeeting.content2: Once the meeting is accepted, it will appear on the room calender shortly.

CreateAMeeting.title: Step 1
CreateAMeeting.content1: Select "Meet" on ThinkSmart Controller home screen to create a new meeting.

CreateAMeeting.title: Step 2
CreateAMeeting.content1: Type a name to search and select the people you want to invite.

CreateAMeeting.title: Step 3
CreateAMeeting.content1: Select "Request to join" to send the meeting invitation.

ShareContent.title: Step 1
ShareContent.content1: Connect your computer to the HDMI-in connector on ThinkSmart One. Your screen will be shared with onsite attendees automatically.

ShareContent.title: Step 2
ShareContent.content1: Join the meeting on ThinkSmart Controller, and click
ShareContent.content2: to start sharing with both onsite and online attendees.

ShareContent.title: Step 3
ShareContent.content2: and disconnect from HDMI-in connector to stop sharing.

faqsList.title: Can I install other meeting applications on ThinkSmart One?
content: No. ThinkSmart One is designed for Microsoft Teams Rooms or Zoom Rooms only. It’s not recommended to install any other meeting applications or any type of application to ThinkSmart One.

faqsList.title: How to switch between a Zoom Rooms account and Admin account?
content: To switch from the Zoom Rooms account to the administrator account:
1.  From the main menu, select Settings → Room → Windows Settings.
2.  Enter the Room passcode and select Continue.
3.  Select ZoomRoomsAdmin and log in with the administrator password.
